column4: I am unable to load Ubuntu linux 6.10 edgy for the first time... I was successful in installing it in text mode from the alternative CD, but when I load it in non-recovery mode, the ubuntu loading bar freezes around 98% and it looks kinda messed up (a green line comes up underneath the bar, the ubuntu graphic looks kinda different).  I have an ATI radeon x850xt card, so i think that it cannot boot since this requires special drivers.  If
I'd try booting without the splash screen if you have it setup at first
you hilight the entry you wanna boot and press "e"
